item.title: Our project "IHABOT" accepted for the prestigious Centennial Research Grant.
item.description: Very fortunate to be a part of the IHABOT project, where I was a part of a team that designed an interactive human-computer interface that collects the RGBD data of the rehabilitation patients with Microsoft Kinectv2 and provide real-time exercise correctness score

item.title: Research Assistantship Under Dr. Sejuti Rahman
item.description: I’ve been hired as a full time research assistant under Dr. Sejuti Rahmna.
